Text: EV is the future! Our new range of products will support the need to train tens of thousands of people to fit the new EV charging points required in the years ahead. Phil is one of the first people to take our new course – find out what he to say about it here:#WorldEVDay4/6

Our Level 3 Award in Largescale EV Charging Installation launched earlier this month.

Only 23% of young people feel they have the skills they need.

Our new research indicates high youth unemployment is set to stay as a shocking 9% of young people currently studying or out of work say they never intend to start working – that’s 227,000 people in the UK. 

Read our full reporthttps://bit.ly/3VUeAcU#YouthMisspent
